task.title: How to add numbers
task.shortdesc: Instructions for using the addition function on the JPS Calculator app.

prereq.p: To succesfully add numbers, you must understand the definition of addition.

step.cmd: Enter the first number by pressing it.
Enter the second number by pressing it.

taskbody.result: The sum of the equation is displayed on the screen.
taskbody.example:
The first number [8] plus [+] the second number [5] equals [=] 13.
8 + 5 = 13
